m_szDocTitle: 20 More BMW i3s Hit London DriveNow Fleet | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- 20 More BMW i3s Hit London DriveNow Fleet Originally published on EV Obsession . The carsharing service DriveNow has added 20 new BMW i3s to its London fleet, according to a recent email sent to EVObsession — bringing the number of i3s in the London fleet up to 50. The new BMW i3s will reportedly be deployed in North and East London, thereby improving DriveNow electric vehicle (EV) availability in these areas of the city. The DriveNow all-electric i3 fleet now represents the largest such fleet in London.   The recent email provides more: The service gives resid
